targets.query: from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "events" and r.type == "stop") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
from(bucket: "${INFLUX_BUCKET}") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r._measurement == "events" and r.type == "stop") |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"]) |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
